catalog_script_client.name: Reservation end date

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_5a441b349793c110002ffef3a253af02
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reserve A Space">bcde9043971a4110002ffef3a253af2f</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:4773fa3997620110002ffef3a253afa1</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Reservation end date</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var script1 = new GlideAjax("ReservationClientUtils");
	script1.addParam("sysparm_name", "dateIsPastCurrentTime");
	script1.addParam("sysparm_dateTime", newValue);
	script1.getXML(dateIsPastCurrentTime);
	
	g_form.hideErrorBox("u_end_date");
	g_form.clearMessages();
	function dateIsPastCurrentTime(response){
		var scriptResponse = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		if(scriptResponse == "true"){
			g_form.showErrorBox("u_end_date","End date must be ahead to current time", true);
		} 
			
		
	}
	
	if(g_form.getValue("u_end_date") != ""){
		var script3 = new GlideAjax("ReservationClientUtils");
		script3.addParam("sysparm_name", "endIsBeforeStart");
		script3.addParam("sysparm_sTime", g_form.getValue("u_start_date"));
		script3.addParam("sysparm_eTime", newValue);
		
		script3.getXML(endIsBeforeStart);
	}
	
	function endIsBeforeStart(response){
			var scriptResponse = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
			if(scriptResponse == "true"){
				g_form.showErrorBox("u_end_date","End date must be ahead of Start",true);
			}	
	}
	
	
	var script7 = new GlideAjax("ReservationClientUtils");
	script7.addParam("sysparm_name", "dateIsOnHoliday");
	script7.addParam("sysparm_dateTime", newValue);
	// 		script7.addParam("sysparm_eTime", g_form.getValue("u_end_time"));


	script7.getXML(dateIsOnHoliday);
	
	
	function dateIsOnHoliday(response){
			var scriptResponse = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
			if(scriptResponse == "true"){
				g_form.showErrorBox("u_end_date","End date must not be within holidays", true);
			}
	}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
	
	if(g_form.getValue("u_start_date") != "" && g_form.getValue("space") != ""){
		var script6 = new GlideAjax("ReservationClientUtils");
		script6.addParam("sysparm_name", "dateIsNotWithinSpaceDays");
		script6.addParam("sysparm_sTime", g_form.getValue("u_start_date"));
		script6.addParam("sysparm_eTime", newValue);
		script6.addParam("sysparm_space", g_form.getValue("space"));
		
		script6.getXML(dateIsNotWithinSpaceDays);
	}
	
	function dateIsNotWithinSpaceDays(response){
			var scriptResponse = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
			var days = scriptResponse.split("|");
			g_form.hideFieldMsg("space");
			g_form.showFieldMsg("space", "Available on: "+ days[1], "info");

				if(scriptResponse.includes("start")){
					g_form.showErrorBox("u_start_date", "Start date must be on Space's available "+
										"days", true);
				}
				if(scriptResponse.includes("end")){
					g_form.showErrorBox("u_end_date", "End date must be on Space's available "+
										"days", true);
				}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-04 08:30:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5a441b349793c110002ffef3a253af02</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reservation end date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Coworking space Reservation System" source="x_616811_coworking">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Coworking space Reservation System">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5a441b349793c110002ffef3a253af02</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-04 08:37:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
